LanguageData.VPE_NuclearGenerator.label: nuclear reactor
LanguageData.VPE_NuclearGenerator.description:
A large nuclear reactor repurposed from a ship power core. Consumes uranium to produce large amounts of power. Can be overloaded, resulting in even larger power output at the cost of local radiation.

Nuclear reactor will quickly overheat and should be cooled at all times.

Cannot be placed outdoors.
